H0.text: who is the voice of kitt. David Hasselhoff

H1.text: who is the voice of kitt. William Daniels

H2.text: who is the voice of kitt. Keith David

H3.text: who is the voice of kitt. Val Kilmer

A4.text: William Daniels as the voice of KITT, or Knight Industries Two Thousand, the autonomous, artificially intelligent car, with whom Michael Knight is partnered.

A5.text: Hasselhoff would work with an assistant off-camera who would read him KITT's lines.
